title: Erigon stuck on "Processing bodies..."
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: erigon/v2.49.2-stable-a8ae8a03/linux-amd64/go1.20.8

OS & Version: Linux Debian

Erigon Command (with flags/config): unclear, via eth-docker

Concensus Layer: Lighthouse

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config): unclear, via eth-docker

Chain/Network: Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour

Chain syncs and works

#### Actual behaviour

The chain is stuck on processing bodies and does not finish.

```
eth-docker-execution-1  | [INFO] [09-26|08:00:56.570] [p2p] GoodPeers                          eth68=33 eth67=33
eth-docker-execution-1  | [INFO] [09-26|08:00:56.933] [txpool] stat                            pending=5627 baseFee=30000 queued=30000 alloc=4.4GB sys=6.2GB

eth-docker-execution-1  | [INFO] [09-26|08:01:03.915] [EngineBlockDownloader] Downloading block bodies block_num=18217239 delivery/sec=1.6MB wasted/sec=0B remaining=782 delivered=5668 cache=54.5MB alloc=4.5GB sys=6.2GB

```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

I needed to move to a bigger SSD. So I stopped all my clients (via eth-docker), copied all data to a new SSD and restarted the clients.
